attributes.action: Allow the reception in the UK of Football Games via Satellite
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently there seems to be a grey area about the legality of receiving, via satellite, Saturday football matches. We in the UK should be treated the same as the rest of Europe and accordingly be free to subscribe to any broadcaster from any country who offers the best value for money for this service. Should BSkyB or any other UK broadcaster be allowed to have the monopoly in this country?
